Query-en: Use Taobao to buy a new laptop. Before purchasing, compare the prices and features of different brands and models. Choose a suitable model, add it to the shopping cart, confirm my address and use my most common payment method, and complete the purchase.
Use Google Calendar to create a project meeting and set a reminder 1 hour before the project meeting starts.

How can I use Google Calendar to schedule a meeting from 10:00 AM to 11:00 AM this Friday, create a video conference link using Zoom, add it to the meeting invitation, send meeting notifications to all participants via Microsoft Teams, and record meeting notes using Google Keep?
How can I purchase FIFA 23 on the EA App? Then open Google Pay and scan the QR code to complete the payment.
I want to get detailed information about my favorite movie on IMDBAPI and check its rating on uNoGSAPI.

First, use the BMICalculator tool to calculate my body mass index BMI. Then, based on the BMI results, use the NutritionCalculator tool to provide personalized diet and exercise recommendations. Next, use the BMICalculator tool to determine my daily nutritional needs. Finally, use the PositivityTips tool to provide targeted exercise advice for my health.

How can I use Taobao to buy a pair of wireless earbuds, ensuring I select a seller with good reviews, check for any promotions or discounts, and compare prices and shipping fees from different sellers to find the most economical option?

I want to know the weather in Sanya next Friday. Please check the flight tickets from my city to Sanya on that day. If there are available tickets, please book them for me. I also want to know the weather in my city today. Can you also tell me what special products Sanya has?

Please search for a dress on my favorite platform, made of silk with a no-questions-asked return policy within seven days. Then search for a set of skincare products, imported brands. Then search for a Bluetooth speaker, with a battery life greater than 20 hours. Use the same parameters to search for this dress on Kaola. Use the same parameters to search for this set of skincare products on Kaola. Finally, please calculate the total price of these items.

Help me calculate my BMI. Based on my basic information, recommend some foods suitable for headaches. According to the recommended food, how many calories does this food contain? Based on my BMI, recommend sports that can relieve head tension. According to your recommended sport, help me search for a pair of yoga socks on my favorite shopping platform. Save the Chengdu travel plan to the calendar memo.
